title: Pamela Adlon Knows About Your Bobby Hill Tattoos
excerpt: That doesn’t mean she necessarily wants to see them in person
text: That doesn’t mean she necessarily wants to see them in person A streaming platform doesn’t bring back a long-cancelled show for a new season unless executives have mathematical proof that doing so will activate its still-devoted fan base. Evidently, King of the Hill falls into the “safe bet” category, since we now know its 14th season — more than 15 years after its 13th-season finale — is coming to Hulu August 4th. But what about the proof of intense fandom that can’t be quantified by anyone in the STEM fields? What about art?Last night’s King of the Hill panel at the ATX TV Festival reminded the show’s creators and stars of the ways fans have let them know how passionate they are about it, up to and including permanently marking their bodies with images of their favorite characters. In this clip from the panel, Pamela Adlon, who voices Bobby, shouts out all the die-hard fans who’ve gotten inked with the character she brought to life. Don't Miss If Redditor drbrunch is NOT one of the King of the Hill fans who let Adlon know directly how much Bobby’s take on Tartuffe meant to him, well, now she knows anyway. html:
That doesn’t mean she necessarily wants to see them in person

A streaming platform doesn’t bring back a long-cancelled show for a new season unless executives have mathematical proof that doing so will activate its still-devoted fan base. Evidently, King of the Hill falls into the “safe bet” category, since we now know its 14th season — more than 15 years after its 13th-season finale — is coming to Hulu August 4th. But what about the proof of intense fandom that can’t be quantified by anyone in the STEM fields? What about art?

Last night’s King of the Hill panel at the ATX TV Festival reminded the show’s creators and stars of the ways fans have let them know how passionate they are about it, up to and including permanently marking their bodies with images of their favorite characters. In this clip from the panel, Pamela Adlon, who voices Bobby, shouts out all the die-hard fans who’ve gotten inked with the character she brought to life.

Don't Miss

If Redditor drbrunch is NOT one of the King of the Hill fans who let Adlon know directly how much Bobby’s take on Tartuffe meant to him, well, now she knows anyway.
